pkgmetadata.longdescription: ===========pytest-mock===========This plugin provides a ``mocker`` fixture which is a thin-wrapper around the patching APIprovided by the `mock package <http://pypi.python.org/pypi/mock>`_:.. code-block:: python import os class UnixFS: @staticmethod def rm(filename): os.remove(filename) def test_unix_fs(mocker): mocker.patch('os.remove') UnixFS.rm('file') os.remove.assert_called_once_with('file')Besides undoing the mocking automatically after the end of the test, it also provides othernice utilities such as ``spy`` and ``stub``, and uses pytest introspection whencomparing calls.|python| |version| |anaconda| |docs| |ci| |coverage| |black| |pre-commit|.. |version| image:: http://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pytest-mock.svg :target:
